title: Business Analyst
description:
About Us:

FintastIQ is a strategy consultancy specializing in pricing, marketing, and growth strategy for start-ups, growth-stage tech, and private equity portfolio companies. We help our clients grow and scale to achieve sustainable impact. Our team brings extensive experience from top-tier consulting firms, offering innovative solutions our clients can bring to life in a matter of weeks.




Position Overview:

We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Business Analyst to join our dynamic team at FintastIQ. This position offers a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in strategy consulting, working closely with clients and seasoned professionals. The ideal candidate is a recent graduate with 1-2 years of experience at a strategy consultancy, such as McKinsey, BCG, or Bain, with a strong interest in business strategy, analytics, and consulting.




Key Responsibilities:

Assist in data collection, analysis, and interpretation to support client projects.
Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify industry trends and market opportunities.
Collaborate with team members to develop strategic recommendations and presentations.
Support the preparation of client deliverables, including reports, presentations, and proposals.
Participate in client meetings and internal problem solving sessions.
Contribute to the development of client learning materials and thought leadership content.
Perform other administrative and project-related tasks, as needed.




Qualifications:

Bachelors degree, preferably in Business, Economics, Finance, Marketing, or a related field.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Expert in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word).
Proficient with Tableau, PowerBI, Python, and/or Alteryx.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills.
Prior work experience in strategy consulting, pricing, or marketing is required.




What We Offer:

A hands-on learning experience with exposure to real-world business challenges.
Mentorship from experienced professionals with backgrounds in top-tier consulting firms.
Opportunity to contribute to impactful projects for high-growth companies and private equity portfolio companies.
A collaborative and inclusive work environment that values diversity and innovation.
Competitive compensation for the internship duration.




How to Apply:

Interested candidates should submit their resume and a cover letter outlining their interest and relevant skills/experience.




FintastIQ is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
